roleset.name: turn in
roleset.note: SUBMIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'submit' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'give'(from submit.01-v predicate notes)
SUBMISSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, submit.01.Corresponds to VNcls contribute-13.2-1-1. (from submission.01-n)

roles.note: The verb frame combines the acquiescing and giving senses, and they take similar syntax, so I have left them combined here aswell. (from submission.01-n)

example.name: submit-v: rgs 0, 1, 2
example.text: However, Tony Lama said it would promptly submit the offer to a special committee of the company's board.
example.arg: to a special committee of the company's board

example.name: submit-v: with purpose
example.text: John submitted his dissertation for comments.

example.name: submit-v: different sense, same syntax
example.text: After his defeat in the marshmallow fight, John submitted to Mary.
example.arg: After his defeat in the marshmallow fight

example.name: submission-n: args 1, 2
example.text: And this faith is a lively faith, and worketh in man a ready submission of his will to God's will.

example.name: submission-n: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: ...his submission of paperwork to the EEOC in January 2007 constitutes the "filing" of an EEOC charge...

roleset.name: give in, be submissive, subservient, meek
roleset.note: SUBMIT-V NOTES: Corresponds to VNcls acquiesce-95. Split off original .01 roleset by Julia for unification.SUBMISSION-N NOTES: Split off original .01 roleset by Julia forunification.SUBMISSIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an aliasfile for unification. (from submissive.01-j)

role.descr: given: explicit mention of will, or similar

example.name: submit-v, all args
example.text: She submitted her will to ours with so much meekness and docility, that you would have declared the sacrifice to ahve beenmade without any internal struggle.
example.arg: with so much meekness and docility, that you would have declared the sacrifice to ahve beenmade without any internal struggle

example.name: submission-j
example.text: Hence, submission to authority cannot be typified by a child's submission to his parents or a servant's submission to his master

example.name: submissive-j
example.text: We were told the dog was submissive to most of the other dogs at his home
example.arg: to most of the other dogs at his home
